name: Neighbor of War
description:
This game was developed for GGJ 2019! We had a lot of fun making it and were quite happy with the result, even thought about developing it further but decided not to. Unfortunately, I still did not have a lot of experience on Unity and being sleep-deprived did not help, so the code is a jenky mess, it is almost literally a spaghetti. 

Neighbor of War is a 2-player game where you have to throw trash at your neighbor's yard. To be honest, you're just trying to keep your yard clean... 

Player 1 uses Arrow Keys + K and L to play.

Player 2 uses WASD + T and Y.

I know, the keys are terrible, sorry about that!
